protocolSections.title: Introduction
protocolSections.body: This training content is for offline learning. It does not replace clinical judgment.

protocolSections.title: Initial assessment
protocolSections.body: Assess oxygenation, ventilation, and hemodynamics. Confirm airway patency and device positioning.

faqs.question: Is this usable offline?
faqs.answer: Yes. The content is bundled locally and can be searched without network access.
